DOC.brief_summary: In spite of identical analgesic protocols, parturients suffer different levels of pain postoperative lay. In this study we hope to identify factors which influence the perception of pain including preoperative anxiety, sleep quality and local anesthesia injection pain.
DOC.brief_title: Factors Predicting Postoperative Cesarean Section Pain
DOC.criteria: Women undergoing spinal anesthesia women unable to cooperate Women undergoing general anesthesia
